Dima Gesellschaft für Diagnostika GmbH E-Mail Drogentests Home Company About us Our Service News 2015 2014 2013 Contact Contact Privacy Imprint Privacy back We take the protection of your personal information very seriously and observe strictly the rules of data protection laws. Arbeitskräfte data is collected, particular by the contact Information Information this website only Information technical purposes. The company Biosynex Deutschland GmbH expressly states that no personal data be passed Information to third parties without prior consent. This website uses Google Analytics, web analytics service provided by Google Inc. ("Google"). Google Analytics uses "cookies", text files that are stored Information your computer, to analyze the use of the website by you. The information generated by the cookie about your use of this website (including your IP address) is transmitted to Google server the U.S. Deutschland stored there. Google use this information to evaluate your use of the website, compiling reports Information website activity Information website operators Deutschland providing other website activity Deutschland internet related services. Information addition, Google may transfer this information to third parties, unless required by law Information if third parties process the information Information behalf of Google. Google not associate your IP address with any other data held by Google. You may refuse the use of cookies by selecting the appropriate settings Information your browser, but we point out that you then probably cannot use all features of this website. By using this site you agree to the processing of data about you by Google the manner described above Deutschland Information the purpose. Your confidence is important to us. Therefore, we gladly answer your questions regarding the processing of your personal data. If you have questions that are not answered by this privacy statement Information if you wish to receive more detailed information, please feel free to contact us.
